input2: male current smoker presenting after feeling short of breath while visiting his wife earlier today. Patient states that he has a 40+-pack-year smoking history. He does not recall any inciting event. He went outside and smoked a cigarette and then felt worse. He presented to the emergency department from there.No cough productive of mucus, no fevers or chills. No chest pain. No prior cardiac history.
